definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: Madame Tussaud's is a famous waxworks in London.
sentences.chinese: 杜莎夫人蜡像馆是伦敦一家著名的蜡像馆。

sentences.english: Madame Tussaud's is a famous waxworks in London.
sentences.chinese: 杜莎夫人蜡像馆是伦敦一家著名的蜡像馆。

sentences.english: At Madame Tussauds, you'll come face-to-face with some of the world's most famous faces.
sentences.chinese: 走进杜莎夫人蜡像馆，你将见到世界上最著名的面孔。

sentences.english: Madame Tussaud is one of most famous waxworks in the world.
sentences.chinese: 杜莎夫人蜡像馆是世界上最著名的蜡像馆之一。

sentences.english: Madame Tussaud is one of most famous waxworks in the world.
sentences.chinese: 杜莎夫人蜡像馆是世界上最著名的蜡像馆之一。

sentences.english: The taxman taxed his strength in order to levy surtax on the waxworks.
sentences.chinese: 为了对蜡像馆征收附加税，税务稽查员费尽了力气。

sentences.english: Tussaud's is a famous waxworks in London.
sentences.chinese: 图索夫人蜡像馆是伦敦一家著名的蜡像馆。

sentences.english: Tussaud's is a famous waxworks in London.
sentences.chinese: 图索夫人蜡像馆是伦敦一家著名的蜡像馆。

sentences.english: The taxman will levy surtax on the waxworks.
sentences.chinese: 局将对蜡像馆征收附加税。

sentences.english: The taxman will levy surtax on the waxworks.
sentences.chinese: 税务局将对蜡像馆征收附加税。

sentences.english: The models from Madame Tussauds Wax Museum are made to look just like real persons.
sentences.chinese: 杜萨夫人蜡像馆里的蜡人被制作得看上去像真人一样。

sentences.english: The taxman went to see a waxwork in the waxworks with a heavy ax.
sentences.chinese: 那个税务员带着一把重斧头去蜡像馆参观蜡像。

sentences.english: There are lots of famous people in Madame Tussaud's.
sentences.chinese: 在杜莎夫人蜡像馆里有许多有名的人。

sentences.english: Jackson posed next to his wax likeness at the Grevin Wax Museum in Paris in 1997.
sentences.chinese: 年，杰克逊在巴黎格雷万蜡像馆与他的蜡像合影。

sentences.english: A lot of people in the waxworks will get the axe.
sentences.chinese: 蜡像馆里的很多人将被解雇。

sentences.english: What kind of things may we see in Madame Tussaud's?
sentences.chinese: 我们能在杜莎夫人蜡像馆看到哪种东西呢？

definition: Disneyland/also written 迪士尼樂園|迪士尼乐园[Di2 shi4 ni2 Le4 yuan2]
